faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear answers before you dive in.

sources.question: Where do the resources come from?
sources.answer: Resources are curated from community submissions and vetted for relevance.

chat.question: Does AI chat replace keyword search?
chat.answer: No. Chat is for guidance, while search stays available for direct browsing.

submissions.question: How do I submit a resource?
submissions.answer: Sign in, open submissions, and share a link with a short description.

privacy.question: What happens to my chat input?
privacy.answer: We only use it to generate recommendations and improve the experience.
